00122         bool Serialize(Serialization *ser) {
00123                 if (!ser->Serialize(calib_x_res, "width")) return false;
00124                 if (!ser->Serialize(calib_y_res, "height")) return false;
00125                 if (!ser->Serialize(calib_K, "intrinsic_matrix")) return false;
00126                 if (!ser->Serialize(calib_D, "distortion")) return false;
00127                 return true;
00128         }
00129 
00131         Camera();
00132 
00134         double GetFovX() {
00135                 return (2.0f * atan2(double(x_res) / 2.0f, (double)calib_K_data[0][0]));        
00136         }
00138         double GetFovY() {
00139                 return (2.0f * atan2(double(y_res) / 2.0f, (double)calib_K_data[1][1]));
00140         }
